title: California Heading For Disaster? Literary Genius Meghan McCain 05.18.22
itunes:title: California Heading For Disaster? Literary Genius Meghan McCain 05.18.22
description:
In episode 1250, Jack and Miles are joined by writer, film producer, and comedian Dani Faith Leonard to discuss… The Biggest Water Disaster In US History Coming To California And We Aren’t Ready, Critical Race Theory ESPECIALLY bad when taught to…Black kids?, The Sad State of Meghan McCain’s Literary Career and more!

  1. The Biggest Water Disaster In US History Coming To California And We Aren’t Ready
  2. Critical Race Theory ESPECIALLY bad when taught to…Black kids?
  3. The Sad State of Meghan McCain’s Literary Career
  4. Meghan McCain's New Book: "My Dad, John McCain"
  5. Meghan McCain’s Book Sold to Hyperion For High Six Figures

LISTEN: Satin Curtains by Molly Lewis

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
